plot: The Greening is a film about self-sabotage and the ways that we spy-on, embarrass, enjoy, and agitate ourselves. This film was created late at night in the woods of Connecticut.
title: The Greening
plot_es: The Greening is a film about self-sabotage and the ways that we spy-on, embarrass, enjoy, and agitate ourselves. This film was created late at night in the woods of Connecticut.
plot_en: The Greening is a film about self-sabotage and the ways that we spy-on, embarrass, enjoy, and agitate ourselves. This film was created late at night in the woods of Connecticut.
